flawed_nl_solution:
The movie theater made 5 * 32 = $<<5*32=160>>160 in matinee tickets.
It made 7 * 40 = $<<7*40=280>>280 in evening tickets.
It made 10 * 58 = $<<10*58=580>>580 in opening night tickets.
There were 32 + 40 + 58 = <<32+40+58=132>>132 customers.
Half of the customers bought popcorn, so 132 / 2 = <<132/2=66>>66 bought popcorn.
Thus, the theater made 10 * 66 = $<<10*66=660>>660 from popcorn.
Therefore, in all, the theater made 160 + 280 + 580 + 660 = $<<160+280+580+660=1680>>1680 on Friday night.
#### 1680

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 132. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
